hero.title: AI-powered video recap
hero.subtitle: Transform long videos into concise summaries automatically.
hero.subtitle2: Save time with AI-generated transcripts and key insights.

platforms.categories: Content Types We Support for Summarization
platforms.categoriesDescription: Our AI automatically analyzes and intelligently summarizes movies, helping you save time and quickly grasp content. The system uses plot recognition technology, detects important scenes, and creates detailed summaries for all movie genres.
platforms.animeMovieDescription: AI analyzes anime movies, automatically detecting important scenes, analyzing plot and characters to create concise yet comprehensive summaries.
platforms.animeSeriesDescription: Process entire anime series with multiple episodes, AI automatically creates timelines, divides chapters and summarizes each arc, helping you easily grasp the entire story.
platforms.movieDescription: Deep analysis of feature films, AI understands complex plots, character development and important highlights to create professional and easy-to-understand summaries.

features.title: All-in-one platform for film & anime recaps

cardRewards.title: Movie & Series Recap
cardRewards.description: Compress full-length movies and multi-episode arcs into tight recaps with beats, chapters, and timelines.

manageCards.title: Auto Subs & Summaries
manageCards.description: Generate subtitles plus concise summaries for anime, K-drama, Hollywood, or local films.

setGoals.title: Highlight Scenes
setGoals.description: Detect standout scenes automatically - battles, plot twists, OST drops - then clip and caption them.

lounges.title: Multi-platform Exports
lounges.description: Export once for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook with subs burned in and aspect ratios tuned.

cardStrategy.title: AI-Powered Analysis
cardStrategy.description: Deep analysis with plot recognition, character development tracking, and intelligent scene detection.

compareApply.title: Smart Timeline
compareApply.description: Auto-transcribe, build plot chapters, tag character moments, and create ready-to-share clips.

packages.title: Service Packages
packages.subtitle: Choose the service package that fits your needs

scriptGeneration.title: Standard
scriptGeneration.subtitle: Script Generation
scriptGeneration.description: Generate scripts for entire video recaps and summaries from user-uploaded sources.
features: Detailed script creation for video recaps

scriptVoice.title: Pro
scriptVoice.subtitle: Script + Voice
scriptVoice.description: Generate scripts for entire video recaps and summaries from user-uploaded sources, with diverse customizable voices as desired.
features: All features of Script Generation package
Support for multiple languages and accents

fullService.title: Ultra
fullService.subtitle: Full Service
fullService.description: Complete the entire video recap process from start to finish. Users only need to upload input and wait (with some customization options) and receive the product.
features: All features of Script + Voice package
Complete video processing from start to finish
Customize some parts according to needs

workflow.label: Workflow
workflow.title: Fully automated workflow from start to finish
workflow.description: From source video to high-quality recap video - all processed automatically by modern fine-tuned AI models. Flexible, fast, and completely automated.

step1.title: Create Project & Upload Resources
step1.description: Create a new project, upload source videos (movies, anime series, films...) and configure project settings. The system automatically recognizes content type and optimizes processing.

step2.title: Auto-Generate Script
step2.description: Using modern fine-tuned LLM models to analyze videos and generate recap scripts tailored to each content type (movie, anime series, drama...). Scripts are optimized for each format.

step3.title: Auto Voice-Over
step3.description: From the generated script, the system automatically creates high-quality voice-over for the recap video. Supports multiple languages with natural voices that match the context.

step4.title: Edit & Finalize
step4.description: Automatically cut, edit, and sync video with voice-over to create the final quality recap video. Export ready-to-use videos with multiple aspect ratios.

models.label: Models
models.title: Advanced AI models fine-tuned for Puzzle
models.description: Puzzle uses modern AI models that have been fine-tuned specifically for video processing, content analysis, and high-quality recap generation. Each model is optimized for specific tasks in the video processing pipeline.

llm.name: LLM
llm.description: Large language model fine-tuned to understand and generate recap scripts based on plot, characters, and video context.

vision.name: Vision Models
vision.description: Computer vision models that detect and analyze scenes, recognize characters, and tag important moments in videos.

asr.name: ASR
asr.description: Multilingual speech recognition system that automatically converts speech to text with high accuracy.

voice.label: Voice
voice.title: Multilingual voiceovers. Natural, studio-grade.
voice.description: Puzzle layers top-tier TTS models for EN, JP, VI, KR, and more, so every recap ships with natural pacing, emotion, and lip-sync-friendly timing. Swap voices without re-editing the timeline.
features: Pick from leading TTS stacks (Neural, diffusion, crossover) tuned for anime, drama, and trailers.
Instant language switch for EN/JP/VI/KR/ES with accent controls and SSML for emphasis.
Auto-align voiceovers to your timeline cuts - no manual nudge or re-render.

quality.label: Quality
quality.title: Pristine output. Original resolution preserved.
quality.description: Recaps keep the source sharpness with frame-accurate trims. Set export presets for trailers, reels, or full recaps without sacrificing bitrate or aspect fidelity.
features: Export up to 4K with original bitrate or lock to custom targets.
Pick aspect ratios (16:9, 9:16, 1:1, 4:5) and safe margins without re-editing.
Burn-in captions optional; keep clean masters for archival and re-renders.

notFound.description: The page might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.
